There are {{ all_users }} users in the system currently.
Those will be added as contacts to the selected campaign(s) or group(s).

If a contact with the same email or phone number is already exist, than its missing data will be updated and reused without createing duplicates.
Please note, that if there are more users with the same email or phone number, then the final number will be less to avoid duplicates.

You can repeat this import step multiple times, it as it will not cause any duplicates.

Only the current users will be imported now. When a new user registers, it will be not added automatically to any list or campaign to eliminate immediate actions of already existing campaigns.
